title: India's solar PV module manufacturing capacity increases from 2.3 GW to 67 GW under 10 years of Make In India
description: India's solar PV module manufacturing capacity has increased from 2.3 GW to 67 GW in the last 10 years beacuse of measures taken under Make In India initiatives, the Ministry of Renewable said.
